original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2106)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2106)@</color>對目標小範圍區域釋放火牛向前奔襲路徑上的敵人，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2106)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>和<color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2106)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2106)@</color> release the fire ox to the target small area to rush forward to attack the enemies on the path, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2106)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int </color> and <color=#80cc00>War</color> cause spell damage to the enemy.
